        <script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
    if (current.sys_class_name == 'sm_m2m_maint_plan_to_record' && !current.propagation_flag) {
        // In the case we set the record active, we need to
        // be sure its schedule will be active too
        if (current.active) {
            setScheduleActive(true);
        } else {
            // In the case all the schedules not active, we need to
            // be sure its plan will be not active too
            var rec = new GlideRecord("sm_m2m_maint_plan_to_record");
            rec.addQuery("schedule", current.schedule);
            rec.addQuery("active", true);
            rec.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.sys_id);
            rec.query();
            if (!rec.hasNext())
                setScheduleActive(false);
        }
    }
}
function setScheduleActive(value) {
    var sch = new GlideRecord("sm_schedule");
    if (sch.get(current.schedule)) {
        sch.propagation_flag = true;
        sch.update();
        sch.active = value;
        sch.update();
        if(value == true)
        setPlanActive(value);
  else{ //A plan should be inactivated only if it has no other active schedules
    var scheduleAgg = new GlideAggregate("sm_schedule");
                scheduleAgg.addQuery("plan", current.schedule.plan);
    scheduleAgg.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.schedule);
                scheduleAgg.addQuery("active", true);
    scheduleAgg.addAggregate('COUNT');
                scheduleAgg.query();
    if(scheduleAgg.next()){
                 if (!(scheduleAgg.getAggregate('COUNT')>0))
                     setPlanActive(false);
    }
  }
        sch.propagation_flag = false;
        sch.update();
    }
}
function setPlanActive(value) {
    var plan = new GlideRecord("sm_maint_plan");
    if (plan.get(current.schedule.plan)) {
        plan.propagation_flag = true;
        plan.update();
        plan.active = value;
        plan.update();
        plan.propagation_flag = false;
        plan.update();
    }
}]]></script>
